name: Kaathil by Keerthana Vijay
about: Don't miss out on Keerthana Vijay's debut live show, "Kaathil", where she will enchant the audience with soulful covers in Kannada, Telugu, and Malayalam. With a massive social reach of nearly 3 crore, Keerthana is set to perform up close and personal in Bangalore, promising a unique and unforgettable musical experience for her fans.

name: JackfruitDanceParty Anniversary #3 Ft. Roi Perez #KoramangalaSOCIAL | IEHPL
about: Join us at the Jackfruit Dance Party Anniversary #3 featuring Roi Perez at Koramangala SOCIAL. Cover charges apply at the venue. This 21+ event requires mandatory ID checks. Please note, we have a zero-tolerance policy towards drugs or illegal substances.

address.streetAddress: 118, 3rd Floor, Koramangala Industrial Area, 7th Block, Above Bodyworks Spa, 7th Block, Koramangala

name: Tribute to Ac/Dc & Guns N' Roses by 2blue
about: Join us at Hard Rock Cafe for The Ultimate Tribute to AC/DC & Guns N’ Roses featuring the incredible 2Blue. With a powerful four-octave voice and captivating storytelling, Tirthankar Poddar brings nostalgia and energy to the stage. This is a must-see for anyone who grew up with classic rock—come and relive those unforgettable moments with someone special.

address.streetAddress: Unit G-25 & 26, Ground Floor, Park Square Mall International Tech Park, Bangalore, Pattandur Agrahara

name: Tribute to Radiohead by Karma Police
about: Karma Police is back with an electrifying tribute to the legendary Radiohead. Experience an immersive audio-visual journey featuring fresh tracks and a deep dive into their nine studio albums, showcasing the band's genre-defying innovation and passion. Don't miss this captivating show!

name: THE GRIND #KORAMANGALA SOCIAL  | IEHPL
about: Experience the energy of 'The Grind', India's longest-running hip-hop event, coming to a city near you! Immerse yourself in the best hip-hop talent, rappers, dance crews, and streetwear pop-ups. Join the community and vibe to the tunes as you do THE GRIND.

address.streetAddress: 118, 3rd Floor, Koramangala Industrial Area, 7th Block, Above Bodyworks Spa, 7th Block, Koramangala

name: Massano Live in Bangalore
about: Don't miss out on the electrifying performance by Massano Live in Bangalore! With a unique blend of aggressive sound design and hypnotic melodies, Massano has quickly become one of the biggest breakout stars in the music scene. From topping the Beatport charts to performing at renowned venues like Tomorrowland and Ultra, Massano's dynamic music is sure to leave you in awe.

name: Bangalore Death Fest Ft. Malevolent Creation (USA)
about: Get ready for the 2nd edition of Bangalore Death Fest presented by Extreme Underground India on December 15th, 2024. Witness the intense metal madness with performances by Malevolent Creation from the USA, Moral Putrefaction from Chennai, Obliterating Vortex, and Virodh. Don't miss out on this brutal lineup of death metal bands!

name: Korolova Live at Sunburn Union | Bangalore
about: Don't miss Krolova live at Sunburn Union Bengaluru on Saturday, 14th December! Hailing from Ukraine, Korolova is a breakout sensation in the melodic house and techno realms, with over 100 million YouTube views and 80 million audio streams. She has played on Tomorrowland’s mainstage and collaborated with premium record labels, captivating audiences worldwide with her melodious masterpieces.

address.streetAddress: Passport office, Mantri Avenue, KHB Games Village, Koramangala

name: Echoes of Earth, 2024 - Bangalore
about: Experience the 7th Edition of Echoes of Earth, India's greenest festival, featuring over 300 International & Indian artists across multiple music genres. Engage in sustainability, conservation, and cultural experiences with solar-powered stages, art installations, workshops, and a curated flea market. Join the exclusive artist brunch for a chance to connect with your favorite performers. Get your tickets now for an unforgettable celebration with a larger message.

address.streetAddress: 149/223, Tarunhunse Village, next to Stone Hill International School, Bengaluru, Karnataka 562157, India

name: Tribute to Queen & Bon Jovi Ft. Moksha All Stars
about: Join us at Hard Rock Cafe, Whitefield for a Live Band Night featuring the renowned Moksha All Stars, paying tribute to Queen & Bon Jovi. Known for their captivating performances, Moksha promises an unforgettable experience with soulful renditions and innovative fusion music. Gather your friends for a night filled with anticipation and melodic wonder!

address.streetAddress: Unit G-25 & 26, Ground Floor, Park Square Mall International Tech Park, Bangalore, Pattandur Agrahara

name: Lollapalooza India 2025
about: Get ready, Mumbai! Lollapalooza India is back for its third edition on March 8-9, 2025. Featuring over 30 iconic artists across various genres like pop, rock, indie, hip-hop, and more, including headliners such as Green Day, Shawn Mendes, and Zedd. Join the ultimate music festival experience with amazing performances, food, beverages, and brand activations. Don't miss out on this two-day extravaganza celebrating live music and culture!
